name: Jimmy Houston's Bass Tournament U.S.A.
overview: The only fishing game available that simulates 4 real tournament lakes. With the advice of Jimmy Houston (Two Time Winner of the B.A.S.S. Tournament "Angler of the Year" Award and 14 Time National Tournament Champion), you can learn all the ins and outs of how to actually go Bass Fishin'! The game features Shimano Rods and Reels.
